Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Four Seasons Hotel London at Canary Wharf in London (Canary Wharf), you'll be minutes from Museum of London Docklands and close to O2 Arena. This 5-star hotel is close to Tower of London and Olympic Stadium.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 142 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Your pillowtop bed comes with down comforters and Egyptian cotton sheets. Cable programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Treat yourself with massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including a health club, an indoor pool, and a spa tub. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, where you can take in a garden view, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. English breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and express check-in. Planning an event in London? This hotel has 5931 square feet (551 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms.


Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, where you can take in a garden view, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. English breakfasts are available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Four Seasons Hotel London at Canary Wharf in London (Canary Wharf), you'll be minutes from Museum of London Docklands and close to O2 Arena. This 5-star hotel is close to Tower of London and Olympic Stadium.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Museum of London Docklands - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
One Canada Square - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
O2 Arena - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Emirates Air Line Greenwich Peninsula Station - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Cutty Sark - 3 km / 1.8 mi
University of Greenwich - 3 km / 1.9 mi
St Katherine's Dock - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Greenwich Market - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Emirates Air Line Royal Docks Station - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Queen's House - 3.1 km / 2 mi
National Maritime Museum - 3.1 km / 2 mi
Design Museum - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Tower Bridge - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Victoria Park - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Tower of London - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi

The preferred airport for Four Seasons Hotel London at Canary Wharf is London (LCY-London City) - 5.4 km / 3.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
